item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Movie Review: Just Friends
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Movie Review: Just Friends
item.description: [...] Remember back in September when bloggers were offered tickets to preview Serenity? I took Sarah to it and wrote a review of Serenity afterwards. The folks from Grace Hill Media sent me an email on Tuesday about doing the same for the movie Just Friends. So Sarah and I were back out at the movies tonight. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Remember back in September when bloggers were offered tickets to preview Serenity? I took Sarah to it and wrote a review of Serenity afterwards. The folks from Grace Hill Media sent me an email on Tuesday about doing the same for the movie Just Friends. So Sarah and I were back out at the movies tonight. […]

item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Movie Review: Serenity
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Movie Review: Serenity
item.description: [...] Sarah and I just got back from watching the early screening of Serenity. As mentioned before, part of the obligation in accepting the free tickets is to talk about the movie, now that I seen it. Let me first say that I can understand why they wanted people to get there early, we showed up about 40 minutes before the movie was to start and it was already packed, with only a few seats left. I think the comment about not guaranteeing was just to cover themselves, it was full and I wouldn’t be surprised if people were turned away. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Sarah and I just got back from watching the early screening of Serenity. As mentioned before, part of the obligation in accepting the free tickets is to talk about the movie, now that I seen it. Let me first say that I can understand why they wanted people to get there early, we showed up about 40 minutes before the movie was to start and it was already packed, with only a few seats left. I think the comment about not guaranteeing was just to cover themselves, it was full and I wouldn’t be surprised if people were turned away. […]
